title: Speech Quality Assessment Model Based on Mixture of Experts: System-Level Performance Enhancement and Utterance-Level Challenge Analysis
author: Xintong Hu (College of CS Zhejiang University), Yixuan Chen (College of CS Zhejiang University), Rui Yang (College of CS Zhejiang University), Wenxiang Guo (College of CS Zhejiang University), Changhao Pan (College of CS Zhejiang University), ...
relevance_why: The paper's exploration of speech quality assessment using advanced acoustic modeling techniques could inform Haohe Liu's work on audio restoration and enhancement, enabling better quantification of audio quality in generative tasks.
background: The study focuses on evaluating the quality of synthetic speech generated by various systems, comparing performance at both overall system and utterance levels.
contribution: This paper introduces a Mixture of Experts architecture to improve mean opinion score prediction for speech quality, achieving better absolute accuracy in system-level evaluations.

technical_comparison.prior_work: Previous models struggled with generalization and performance across different granularities of evaluation tasks.
technical_comparison.novelty: This work improves upon prior methods by leveraging multi-task learning and a gating mechanism to dynamically allocate expert model resources based on input features.

key_innovation: Employs a specialized Mixture of Experts model with multi-task learning to enhance speech quality assessment across diverse synthesis technologies.
real_world_impact: The model could improve automated speech evaluation tools used in industry for speech synthesis applications, potentially leading to better synthesized speech quality in consumer products.
limitations: The model exhibits limited performance improvements in utterance-level assessments compared to system-level evaluations, indicating room for further refinement.

new_terms.Mean Opinion Score (MOS): **Mean Opinion Score (MOS)** is a common subjective measure of the perceived quality of a service, where human listeners provide ratings that represent overall user satisfaction.
new_terms.Mixture of Experts (MoE): **Mixture of Experts (MoE)** is a machine learning architecture that combines multiple expert models; each expert specializes in different parts of the input space, allowing dynamic selection of models based on input characteristics.
